title: E field map - sign and location of point charge

content.question: The electric field <math alttext="vector E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mover><mi>E</mi><mo>â†’</mo></mover></math> created by a single point charge in a region of space is represented by the electric field map shown in the figure. Which of the following could produce the field map shown?

choices.label: A positive point charge located to the left of the region depicted
A positive point charge located to the right of the region depicted
A negative point charge located to the left of the region depicted
A negative point charge located to the right of the region depicted

content.answer: A positive point charge located to the left of the region depicted

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
